cast.name: 阿尔贝托·阿斯卡里 Alberto Ascari
朱塞佩·法里纳 Giuseppe Farina
皮耶罗·塔鲁菲 Piero Taruffi

trans_title: 世界一级方程式锦标赛 第三季
introduction: The 1952 Formula One season was the sixth season of FIA Formula One motor racing. In comparison to previous seasons, the 1952 season consisted of a relatively small number of Formula One races, following the FIA's decision to run all the Grand Prix events counting towards the World Championship of Drivers to Formula Two regulations rather than Formula One.The 3rd FIA World Championship of Drivers, which began on 18 May and ended on 7 September after eight races, was won by Alberto Ascari, driving for Scuderia Ferrari.
chinese_title: 世界一级方程式锦标赛 第三季
